channel.description: This podcast is an interactive online book club. We will discuss a variety of books. Join us live for our book discussions! This Podcast was created using www.talkshoe.com

item.title: EPISODE4 - The Book Report- Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows
item.author: bookreportpodcast@gmail.com
item.description: Have you finished reading Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows? If so, come join us to discuss this long awaited finale to the Harry Potter saga!
